pilipina sancharaye yedunu sudothum piyathumata erata jesu nikayika piyawarun wenama nidahase munagasime awasthawak laba di thibuneya. 2015 janawari 16 wanada sandhyawe manila nuwara aposthalika thanapathi karyalaye di pilipinaya pura sewawa karana jesu nikayika piyawaru 40 namak ethuman samaga allapa sallapayehi yedemin gatha kalaha.
